verses.verse: And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H1129>Build<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>oxen<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>.

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%>; and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> and <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H3320>Stand<s%> by thy burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and I will <S%H3212>go<s%>: peradventure the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7136>come<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> me: and <S%H1697>whatsoever<s%> he <S%H7200>sheweth<s%> me I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee. And he <S%H3212>went<s%> to an high <S%H8205>place<s%>. to an: or, solitary

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, I have <S%H6186>prepared<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and I have <S%H5927>offered<s%> upon every <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in <S%H1109>Balaam's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7725>Return<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and thus thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto him, and, lo, he <S%H5324>stood<s%> by his burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>, he, and all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> hath <S%H5148>brought<s%> me from <S%H758>Aram<s%>, out of the <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%>, saying, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, <S%H779>curse<s%> me <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H3212>come<s%>, <S%H2194>defy<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
<S%H4100>How<s%> shall I <S%H5344>curse<s%>, whom <S%H410>God<s%> hath not <S%H6895>cursed<s%>? or how shall I <S%H2194>defy<s%>, whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath not <S%H2194>defied<s%>?

For from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> him, and from the <S%H1389>hills<s%> I <S%H7789>behold<s%> him: lo, the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%>, and shall not be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

Who can <S%H4487>count<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7255>fourth<s%> part of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? Let me <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5315><s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3477>righteous<s%>, and let my <S%H319>last<s%> end be like his! me: Heb. my soul, or, my life

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, What hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%> unto me? I <S%H3947>took<s%> thee to <S%H6895>curse<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and, behold, thou hast <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them <S%H1288>altogether<s%>.
And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, Must I not take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> that which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7760>put<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>?

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, I pray thee, with me unto <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, from whence thou mayest <S%H7200>see<s%> them: thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H657>but<s%> the <S%H7097>utmost<s%> part of them, and shalt not <S%H7200>see<s%> them all: and <S%H6895>curse<s%> me them from thence.

And he <S%H3947>brought<s%> him into the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6839>Zophim<s%> <S%H6822><s%>, to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%>. Pisgah: or, the hill
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H3320>Stand<s%> <S%H3541>here<s%> by thy burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, while I <S%H7136>meet<s%> the LORD <S%H3541>yonder<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Go <S%H7725>again<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and <S%H1696>say<s%> thus.

And when he <S%H935>came<s%> to him, behold, he <S%H5324>stood<s%> by his burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> with him. And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, What hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%>?

And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%>; <S%H238>hearken<s%> unto me, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%>:

<S%H410>God<s%> is not a <S%H376>man<s%>, that he should <S%H3576>lie<s%>; neither the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, that he should <S%H5162>repent<s%>: hath he <S%H559>said<s%>, and shall he not <S%H6213>do<s%> it? or hath he <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, and shall he not make it <S%H6965>good<s%>?
Behold, I have <S%H3947>received<s%> commandment to <S%H1288>bless<s%>: and he hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%>; and I cannot <S%H7725>reverse<s%> it.

He hath not <S%H5027>beheld<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, neither hath he <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5999>perverseness<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> is with him, and the <S%H8643>shout<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is among them.
<S%H410>God<s%> brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; he hath as it were the <S%H8443>strength<s%> of an <S%H7214>unicorn<s%>.

Surely there is no <S%H5173>enchantment<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, neither is there any <S%H7081>divination<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: according to this <S%H6256>time<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, What hath <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6466>wrought<s%>! against: or, in

Behold, the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> as a great <S%H3833>lion<s%>, and lift <S%H5375>up<s%> himself as a young <S%H738>lion<s%>: he shall not lie <S%H7901>down<s%> until he <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H2964>prey<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%>.
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, Neither <S%H5344>curse<s%> them at <S%H6895>all<s%>, nor <S%H1288>bless<s%> them at <S%H1288>all<s%>.

But <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H1696>Told<s%> not I thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, All that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%>, that I must <S%H6213>do<s%>?

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, I pray thee, I will <S%H3947>bring<s%> thee unto <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; peradventure it will <S%H3474>please<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> that thou mayest <S%H6895>curse<s%> me them from thence.
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> unto the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%>, that <S%H8259>looketh<s%> <S%H6440>toward<s%> <S%H3452>Jeshimon<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H1129>Build<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>.
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
